code: import axios from'axios';var getReviews=function getReviews(product_id,count,sort){return axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:3004/reviews',{params:{product_id:product_id,count:count,sort:sort}}).catch(function(err){console.log(err,'error getting reviews metadate for the product id');});};export default getReviews;
